snippet: The Swedish retailer Ikea is recalling around 442,000 children’s night lights because the cover of the light can detach, creating a risk of electrical shock.
abstract: Ikea recalls all of its Patrull night lights after child sustained electric shock and minor hand injury trying to remove light from outlet.
lead_paragraph: The Swedish retailer Ikea is recalling around 442,000 children’s night lights because the cover of the light can detach, creating a risk of electrical shock.

headline.main: Ikea Recalls Night Lights That Pose Safety Risk
headline.print_headline: Ikea Recalls Night Lights That Pose Safety Risks
